      • afterMoveRequest

        public java.lang.String afterMoveRequest()
                                  throws EndOfProgram,
                                         NotOfProtocol
        Checks what kind of move the player should make.
        Returns:
        a single character representation as to which move should be made.
        Throws:
        EndOfProgram - when the program ends.
        NotOfProtocol - when the input does not comply with the protocol.
